title: Announcement, New Works: Sandra Budd, Jodi Kingston, Brian Kritzman, 1991
title_raw: New Works: Sandra Budd, Jodi Kingston, Brian Kritzman
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, lower center, left: Design: Edward Fella, [symbols] EMIGRE #17
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper left quadrant, running upward, sideways: SANDRA BUDD/ JODI KINGSTON/ BRIAN KRITZMAN; across upper third of sheet, center: NEW/ WORKS; across center, left: FEBRUARY 15TH-/ MARCH 15TH, 1991/ DETROIT/ FOCUS GALLERY/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd floor/ Detroit, Michigan/ 48226; center, running downward, sideways: FRIDAY/ OPENING:/ FEBRUARY 15TH/ 5:30-8:30 PM; across lower third of sheet: Hours: NOON To 6pm TELEPHONE/ WEDnesday THROUGH SATurday (313) 962-9025/ ALSO IN THEAREA:/ -at/ the sametime/ :DETroit ARTists MARKet/ "INSTALLATIONS"/ Juror:/ NELSON/ SMITH
Verso: Imprinted in black across lower left quadrant: ACROSS/ FROM THE BRICKTOWN/ PEOPLE MOVER STATION/ WITH/ SUPPORT/ FROM/ the Michigan/ Council for/ THE ARTS/ &/ THE DETROIT/ Council/ of THE/ ARTS/ member/ of N.A.A.O./ = op. Org.; running upward, sideways: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 743 BEAUBIEN/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN 48226; across lower right quadrant: Non-Profit ORG./ BILK RATE/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ DETROIT, MI-/ CHIGAN/ Permit No 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  [Printed] hand-lettered calligraphic text throughout. 
Recto: Across upper third of sheet, text giving title, participating artists.  Across center, left, text giving date, location, reception information.  Across lower third of sheet, text giving times, contact and additional information. 
Verso: Upper left quadrant, abtract line design.  Across lower third of sheet, text giving sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, New Works: Sandra Budd, Jodi Kingston, Brian Kritzman, 1991. Offset lithograph on off-white paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-17
